about_the_game:
Survive

Running through the woods alone is never safe, but with a group of people seems to quiet the thing down, cause that is your friend... right!? Don't believe anything you see. Survive the night in the forest, collect resources to try and escape. Explore with your friends or alone as you try to conquer this enemy. You will play as a person lost in the woods, with only a flashlight. You will have to work alone or with other people to find resources, make items, and use them to escape, all while being hunted down by a creature. The creature will attempt to stop you, and prevent you from getting away from its grasps, but only at night.

Explore The Woods

The woods are never safe, especially away from civilization, but even more so when you have no idea where you are. Learn the map, and keep direction in mind, your stuck somewhere. Abandon buildings rotting away, items left behind for you to keep. All while your being hunted down.

content_descriptors.notes: You will be attacked by a monster, but no fighting.

name: In The Woods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i-7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 Or Newer
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Have you ever been wandering through the woods, alone or with some friends... But what's that sound! Something else is out here with you, and it seems interested. This is a horror survival game, where you lost in the woods with yourself or with friends. You are trying to escape from the creature.
